availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Smith Betts in Muskingham County, Ohio, on September 28, 1826. Father of Samuel Betts, Elizabeth Betts, Sarah A. Betts, and Isaac Betts. Farmer in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bristol, p. 341A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Bristol, p. 337-38.
Ohio Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Muskingham County Marriages, Film #000865142, p. 105.
